keyMoments.title: Caroline Revealed as Substitute Queen
keyMoments.description: Caroline is shown serving as the substitute queen of Kamabakka Kingdom while Emporio Ivankov is imprisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the leadership structure of the kingdom in Ivankov's absence.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Transformed into Okama
keyMoments.description: The Kamabakka Kingdom's influence reaches its peak as Sanji is converted into an okama after losing to Caroline.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the kingdom's ability to 'convert' newcomers and the power of their culture.

statusHistory.description: Functioning under Caroline's leadership during Ivankov's absence
